CC: Mridul Nambiar <mridul.nambiar@nascodubai.com>; Kevin Chalhoub <Kevin.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Saadeddine Elnakib <selnakib@ev-lab.io>

Subject: Re: NIO & Farizon Insurance quotation

تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Umer,

Good day to you.

Thank you for you Support @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:hagop.ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  please provide the information required for us to find a solution.
I would also like to know, @Mridul Nambiar <mailto:mridul.nambiar@nascodubai.com>  , what were the reasons Liva mentioned as per your email.(LIVA is currently unable to onboard with these vehicles)
So we can find a solution to work together.


Best regards,

Jackie Merchant 
EV Leasing & Rental
+971 58 541 4500
 <https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1-Ddizmpxe9_kDi6uzmzWJjHqGqyKkU0f&export=download> 
Building 6, The Greenhouse
Dubai Design District
Dubai, UAE

Jackie Merchant 
EV Leasing & Rental
+971 58 541 4500
 <https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1-Ddizmpxe9_kDi6uzmzWJjHqGqyKkU0f&export=download> 
Building 6, The Greenhouse
Dubai Design District
Dubai, UAE


On Wed, Jun 25, 2025 at 2:01 PM Umer Qazi (AE) <umer.qazi@livainsurance.com <mailto:umer.qazi@livainsurance.com> > wrote:


	Dear Jackie,

	 

	Thank you for your query.

	 

	I have discussed this internally, and we can review the request on the basis that the placement is for the overall fleet. I understand that the fleet is currently insured with GIG Insurance. Before we can provide a quotation, we will need the following information to assess the risk:

	 

	*	Last 3 years’ loss report from GIG
	*	Fleet details

	 

	In the meantime, since there is an established fleet policy with GIG, the current vehicles can continue to be insured under that policy.

	 

	We have also been approached by NASCO Brokers regarding the same query, and I understand that you work with NASCO for these placements. Please note that we can only work on this query on a fleet basis and not for individual vehicle placements. I would appreciate if you can route all these queries via NASCO brokers. 

	 

	Regards

	Umer Qazi

	Manager – Partnerships 

	Email: umer.qazi@livainsurance.com <mailto:umer.qazi@livainsurance.com> 

	Mobile Number : +971-50-6954421

	Landline (D): +971 4 3029990

We have also been approached by NASCO Brokers regarding the same query, and I understand that you work with NASCO for these placements. Please note that we can only work on this query on a fleet basis and not for individual vehicle placements. I would appreciate if you can route all these queries via NASCO brokers. 

	 

	Regards

	Umer Qazi

	Manager – Partnerships 

	Email: umer.qazi@livainsurance.com <mailto:umer.qazi@livainsurance.com> 

	Mobile Number : +971-50-6954421

	Landline (D): +971 4 3029990

	 

	

	 

	From: Jackie Merchant <jmerchant@ev-lab.io <mailto:jmerchant@ev-lab.io> >

	Best regards,

	Jackie Merchant 

	EV Leasing & Rental
